Uses of Interface
java.sql.ShardingKeyBuilder

Packages that use ShardingKeyBuilder
Package
Description
java.sql
Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java programming language.
javax.sql
Provides the API for server side data source access and processing from the Java programming language.

  • Uses of ShardingKeyBuilder in java.sql

    Methods in java.sql that return ShardingKeyBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ShardingKeyBuilder
    ShardingKeyBuilder.subkey(Object subkey, SQLType subkeyType)
    This method will be called to add a subkey into a Sharding Key object being built.
